channel.title: Privacy on Best Place to Code
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy on Best Place to Code

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy OSA COM collects some personal data from its users. We take great care in collecting only the essential minimum data that we need to provide the service and to manage this data adequately. This document provides more details about the data we gather and how it is used. Data controller Although OSA COM is a community initiative, the legal entity responsible for the event is: Altinity,Inc 2001 Addison Street, Suite 300, Berkeley, CA, 94704
